text: Neville Wakefield (born 1963) is an art curator.https://news.artnet.com/art- world/neville-wakefield-brand-collaborations-1120514 ==Life and work== Wakefield was born in England, United Kingdom. He is the curator and artistic directorhttps://www.ft.com/content/f78a21e4-4416-11e9-b83b-0c525dad548f of Desert X.https://www.desertx.org/about-us ==Personal Life== He lives and works between the Isles of Scillyhttps://www.nytimes.com/2015/03/29/t-magazine/neville-wakefield-style- profile.html and Harlem, New York.https://www.wmagazine.com/story/neville- wakefield-olympia-scarry-gstaad ==See also== * POSTmatter (magazine) * Helmut Lang (artist) * Destricted * The Cremaster Cycle ==References== Category:Living people Category:1963 births Category:British art critics Category:British curators Category:Art curators Category:Cultural historians
title: Neville Wakefield
